name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software/Application Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **C#**, **.NET**, and **SQL** to create high-performance applications. Proficient in developing **RESTful APIs** and adept in **Microsoft Azure**, ensuring robust application integration and cloud-native deployment. Demonstrated expertise in **Agile development** methodologies, fostering effective collaboration and communication within teams.
Additionally skilled in **PowerShell**, **Power Apps**, and **Power Automate** for streamlining processes and enhancing operational efficiency. Strong problem-solving abilities complemented by a solid foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Experience in deploying microservices and CI/CD pipelines while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
